com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.auth

类 AylaAuthorization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.auth.AylaAuthorization

  • public class AylaAuthorization
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing session authorization information. Objects of this type are returned from AylaAuthProvider objects when used to sign-in. Authorizations may be cached and used to initialize a CachedAuthProvider object, which can be passed to AylaLoginManager.signIn(com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.auth.AylaAuthProvider, java.lang.String, com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.auth.AylaAuthorization>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener) to refresh the previous authorization.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AylaAuthorization

        public AylaAuthorization()

    • 方法详细资料

      • getUrl

        public java.lang.String getUrl()
        Returns the custom URL for this authorization, if present. This field is used for SSO or O-Auth authorizations.
        返回:
        The custom URL for this authorization, or null if one is not present

      • getCreatedAt

        public java.util.Date getCreatedAt()
        Returns the time the authorization object was created
        返回:
        the time the authorization object was created

      • getAccessToken

        public java.lang.String getAccessToken()
        Returns the access token for this authorization. This is required to make API calls to the Ayla servicef and is generally not used outside of the SDK.
        返回:
        the access token for this authorization

      • getRefreshToken

        public java.lang.String getRefreshToken()
        Returns the refresh token for this authorization. This token is used to obtain a new authorization when the current one is about to expire.
        返回:
        the refresh token for this authorization

      • getExpiresIn

        public long getExpiresIn()
        Returns the number of seconds after creation that this authorization expires. Call getSecondsToExpiry() to get the number of seconds from the current time that this object will expire.
        返回:
        The number of seconds since the time of fetch that this object will expire in

      • getRoleTags

        public AylaAuthorization.RoleTag[] getRoleTags()
        Returns the array of role tags, if present. Otherwise returns null.
        返回:
        the array of role tags, if present. Otherwise returns null.

      • getSecondsToExpiry

        public long getSecondsToExpiry()
        Returns the number of seconds from the current time that this authorization expires, or 0 if the authoriztion has already expired.
        返回:
        The number of seconds from the current time that this authorization expires in, or 0 if the authorization has already expired.

      • getRole

        public java.lang.String getRole()
        Returns the role for this authorization. Roles are OEM-specific.
        返回:
        the role for this authorization

      • updateFrom

        public void updateFrom(AylaAuthorization other)
        Used to update this authorization object from another. Used internally by the SDK.
        参数:
        other - AylaAuthorization used to update this object.
